item.title: Iveco network growing in Portugal
item.description:
Iveco network growing in Portugal

Launch Iveco new dealer in Portugal, NCN. Another special day with nice Portuguese people

item.title: Iveco takes us to Chateau de Lasteours
item.description:
Iveco takes us to Chateau de Lasteours

Reuniao Regional da Iveco no Chateau de Lasteours. Oportunidade para provar bons vinhos e aprender um pouco mais sobre o processo.

item.title: Narbonne in high style
item.description:
Narbonne in high style

After hard day's work packed with Iveco presentations

item.title: Lowry in China
item.description:
Lowry in China

In our few years living in Manchester, one of our favourite cultural spots was the Lowry Museum, in Salford. Its industrial revolution era paintings always gave us a strange feeling when contrasted with the modern buildings that occupy the city.

item.title: El Kijote Kathakali
item.description:
El Kijote Kathakali

Today we attended to a presentation of Don Quijote in Kathakali, in the Naves del Espanol Theatre, Matadero de Madrid. Most certainly a different experience. The dressing and dancing is incredible and the interpretation is very slow but involving.
